TextLibrary.Text: Elistara, listen to me! Bane has not won this war yet. He sealed off Gornak's Gap to keep us from his lands. He wouldn't have done that if he wasn't afraid of us!
Elistara, listen to me! Bane has not won this war yet. He sealed off Gornak's Gap to keep us from his lands. He wouldn't have done that if he wasn't afraid of us!
Elistara, listen to me! Bane has not won this war yet. He sealed off Gornak's Gap to keep us from his lands. He wouldn't have done that if he wasn't afraid of us!
Elistara, listen to me! Bane has not won this war yet. He sealed off Gornak's Gap to keep us from his lands. He wouldn't have done that if he wasn't afraid of us!
The Agarian Knights have defeated him in the past. We can do it again.
The Agarian Knights have defeated him in the past. We can do it again.

The Agarian Knights have defeated him in the past. We can do it again.
Then stay and defend Ylarie with us. Bane will attack soon. If we survive, perhaps I will believe you.
